mean_cn: n. 实习医师，被拘留者；  v. 作实习医师，拘留
mean_en: a student or recent graduate who works for a period of time at a job in order to get experience
word_etyma: in使…，作…+tern三个一组 → 实习医师
sentence: Our hospital's interns hope to learn as much as they can from our doctors.
sentence_trans: 我们医院的实习医师希望能尽可能地向他们的医生学习。
